title: Matrix Columns
text: Identify the number of variables present. Add the number of variables by $$1$$ to determine number of columns in matrix.
speech: Identify the number of variables present. Add the number of variables by  1  to determine number of columns in matrix.
pacedSpeech: Identify the number of variables present. Add the number of variables by   1
to determine number of columns in matrix.

title: Matrix Rows
text: The number of equations will serve as the number of rows in the matrix.
speech: The number of equations will serve as the number of rows in the matrix.
pacedSpeech: The number of equations will serve as the number of rows in the matrix.
